overview:
Lee is a visionary, serial entrepreneur and a creative genius. He brings over twenty years of experience and achievement to Ziipa.com. Lee understands the psychology of the Internet users and is a master in marketing and social media.

Lee is a resourceful and innovative leader who possesses excellent problem solving and troubleshooting skills. His key strengths include: strategic leadership, business development and project management. In Web 1.0 Lee developed from the ground up several Internet properties that he developed and successfully sold. He has traveled most of the world and speaks both English and Spanish fluently.

Lee graduated from Northeastern University Boston, MA with a Bachelor of Science Degree in Industrial Engineering. He worked in the Hi Tech industry at Teradyne, Inc in Boston, MA his duties were to oversee facility operations for the automation testing equipment manufacturer. With office and factory space totaling over a million square feet. His responsibilities included monitoring vendor performance, placing contracts out for bid, assessing proposals and coordinating with upper management. Implemented budgets exceeding 10 million dollars per quarter.

He also worked in Dennison Manufacturing, Inc. in Medford, MA as an industrial engineer for their floppy disk production. His alterations within the processes and procedures increased production by over 108% eliminating waste and increasing production and profits.
